meanings.definition: A famous waterfall in North America.
meanings.sent1: The tourists were amazed by the beauty of Niagara Falls.
meanings.sent2: I hope to visit Niagara Falls one day.
meanings.sent3: The fish at Niagara Falls must have a thrilling time swimming there.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter cascaded down the stairs like Niagara Falls.
meanings.sent5: The roar of Niagara Falls echoed through the valley.

meanings.definition: A type of grape used in winemaking.
meanings.sent1: The winery used Niagara grapes to make their famous wine.
meanings.sent2: Niagara grapes are known for their sweetness.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels in the vineyard loved snacking on Niagara grapes.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as smooth and rich as Niagara grape wine.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of Niagara grapes filled the air during harvest season.

meanings.definition: A type of fabric with a soft finish.
meanings.sent1: She loved the feel of the Niagara fabric against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The dress was made of luxurious Niagara fabric.
meanings.sent3: The cat curled up on the Niagara fabric blanket for a nap.
meanings.sent4: His words were as comforting as a hug from a Niagara fabric pillow.
meanings.sent5: The curtains swayed gently in the breeze, revealing the beauty of the Niagara fabric.
